attributes.action: Harsher punishments. Tag stalkers and custodial sentences early in complaint.
attributes.additional_details: Stalkers law is not harsh enough for the criminal and restricts the victims rights before the criminal, this needs to be the other way round and the victim taken seriously at the very beginning. Tagging the stalker allows the victim to go about their life without absolute restriction.
attributes.background: To give the police stricter, mandatory policies in acting on complaints regards stalking.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the courts.
